feed.title: Clipious Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/641
  • fix #638 by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/643
  • fix issues with failed downloads that can't be removed. by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/644

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.22.3...1.22.4

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update dependencies by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/648
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/645
  • add fallback to make sure the thumbnail fails as little as possible by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/651

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.22.4...1.22.5

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/654
  • change user agent to be Clipious/version by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/655

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.22.5...1.22.6

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update bug_report.md - Added Instance-Information by @WreckingBANG in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/660
  • Feature/libraries update 2025 01 30 by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/666
  • fix issues with latest version of invidious by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/665
  • add settings to force the TV ui, can be useful for some tv boxes by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/667
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/658

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.22.6...1.22.7

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.22.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • show a message when no public servers are available by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/678
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/668

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.22.7...1.22.8
